entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cassiar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:26 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -25.0°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 32.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 28. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
